name: Flappy Chooky TV
description:
***** NO ADS ***** NO IAP'S ***** JUST ENDLESS VALUE AND FUN! *****

Flap, flap, flap your way to victory in this addictive game for your TV!

Try to flap and fly over as many crates as possible to gain the best high score and beat your friends and family's score.

Full concentration required - Good Luck!

Features:

* On button gameplay.
* Highly addictive.
* Flappy family fun for all ages.
* Cute quality graphics and great sound.
* Best Hi-Score and persistent score.
